txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wooden maces from the stronger Orcs camped throughout Bree-land. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'Perhaps these are a badge of office or maybe they are the first weapons that they ever used. Who is to know? Bree is safer now, thank you.'
'There are tougher Orcs out in the areas of Bree-land along the roads. Take them down to size, and Bree will be grateful.'
Men of Bree Task: Broken Wooden Maces
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of broken wooden maces from Orcs throughout Bree-land.
Deliver the broken wooden maces to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding broken wooden maces from the stronger Orcs camped around Bree-land. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Broken wooden maces from the stronger Orcs camped throughout Bree-land.
